game.name: Farol del Diablo (Devil's Lantern)
game.shortDescription: Armed with only a flashlight and limited resources, Catalina, our protagonist, embarks on a quest for valuable objects despite the rumors of the Luz Mala guarding the town. You must uncover what happened there before the night consumes you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Armed with only a flashlight and limited resources, Catalina, our protagonist, embarks on a quest for valuable objects despite the rumors of the Luz Mala guarding the town. You must uncover what happened there before the night consumes you.
